properties.name: io.sapl.policyEnforcementFilter
properties.description: Setting this property to TRUE will activate the SaplFilterPolicyEnforcementPoint FilterBean in the application context.

properties.name: io.sapl.pdp.embedded.pdp-config-type
properties.description: pdp-config-type may be RESOURCES (loading policies and configuration from bundles resources) or FILESYSTEM (loading policies and configuration from a folder on the filesystem
